message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for my budget.  Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do a bit better than $60, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $85?
I appreciate you moving closer to my budget, Alice.  How about we settle at $75?
I can do $80, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I think you'll really like this product. It's a great deal for you at this price!
